1.「それ 本当に咲かせることが できたんだね。| さっすが <pc>！ ありがとう: That, you really managed to make it bloom. Way|to go <pc>! Thanks.

2.「いったい なんなん？| 急に ウチを 連れだしたりなんかして……: What's going on? Why did you suddenly take us|out of the house?

4.「ふーん。なるほどねぇ。どうせ あんた| アサヒに まんまと 乗せられたんやろ？: Hmmm. I see. In any case, you must have been|taken in by Asahi, right? Thanks for coming|all the way down here.

5.「えへへ。カミハルムイ城の研究室で| ヨイちゃんが この花を 探していることを|:
Heh heh. I heard that Yoi was looking for this|flower in the research lab at Kamiharmui|Castle. I was wondering if I could be of any|
|help!

6.「アサヒも <pc>も| ほんま アホがつくくらいの お人好しやこと。: Both Asahi and <pc> are really good-|natured to the point of being idiots.

7.「まぁ ええわ。| これ 探してたのは ほんまや。| ありがたく 頂戴いたします: Oh, well, that's okay. This is exactly what I|was looking for. Thank you very much.

8.「ねえねえ。これ あたしも やりたい！| だって この花に 願いを込めると| そ: Hey, hey. I want to do this too! If you make a|wish on this flower, your wish will come true,|right?　Sounds fun!

9.「好きにしたら ええやん。: You can do whatever you want.

10.「そうするっ！| ねぇ <pc>。| あたしにも 一輪ちょうだい。: I will! Hey <pc>. Give me a flower,|too.

12.「これで ばっちりだね！ それでー？| 想望華に願いを込めてまで 両想いになりた: That's perfect!　So? What kind of person does|Yoi want to be with until she puts her wish in|Soumouka?

14.「はぁ？ なんで ウチに| 好きな人が おることになってるん？| ……アホらし。: What?　Why does it have to be that there's a|person I like? That's stupid.

15.「えー 違うの？| てっきり 恋の悩みだと思ったんだけどなぁ。| 隠さなくても: Oh, no? I thought it was a love problem. You|don't have to hide it.

16.「ちゃうわ！ | ほんま あんたの思考回路 どないなってるん？: That's not true! What's really going on in|your thought process?

17.「……本当かなぁ？ まぁ いいや。: I wonder if it's true?　Well, never mind.

18.「あたしね。ヨイちゃんに避けられてると思って| さみしかったんだよ。それで <p: You know. I was lonely because I thought Yoi|was avoiding me. So I asked <pc> to|help me...

19.「避けてへん！ | そんな しょうもない思いちがいで| <pc>を 付き合わさせ: I'm not avoiding you! Please don't make|<pc> go along with you on such a|silly misunderstanding.

20.「えへへ そっか。| それなら よかったぁー。: Hehehe, I see. If that's the case, I'm glad.

21.「それじゃ ヨイちゃんの役にも立てたことだし！| 帰ろっか。あたしたちの家に。|: Well then, we've done Yoi a big favor! Let's|go home. Let's go back to our house. We want|to thank <pc> too, so please come.

22.「ほんま ウチのために あんたの手まで| わずらわせて すんまへんなぁ。| でも: I'm really sorry to have bothered you for our|sake. But thanks to you, I'm saved. Thank you|very much.
